page.title: 04MEOPHAM FOOTPATH GROUP
page.content: The group was established in l962.There are seventeen groups in the Meopham and District Footpath Group.There is an extensive footpath system in the area. There has been a new footpath established by the Meopham and District Footpath Group but it is not in the Meopham area.There are about 2OO _ 25O people in the Footpath Group of which lO _ 35 are regular walkers.There are walks once a fortnight and they are mostly on a Sunday.The organisation has a newsletter to tell the walkers where to meet and what days the walks are on. There is a leader for each group. There are about two walks a month.
